Detailed Description

Abstract base class for individual boards, without shiftDevice objects.

This base class differs from shiftBoard in that it is designed to enable the user to write directly to the bits shifted to the board, without the intervention of any devices. This will be faster in applications that do not require the bookkeeping of stepper applications or similar.

uint8_t shiftBoardDirect::setBoardOutput ( uint8_t *  bytes )

Set the board's output.

Parameters:
bytesAn array of bytes representing the desired output state of the board. Must have at least as many members as specified by the output of shiftBoardDirect::getBoardSize()
Returns:
Exit status. Always returns 0 (success) now
